body:
We've collected 15 of the top new studio websites found around the web.

Check them out if you're looking for a bit of creative inspiration!

![MØM Landing Page](/images/uploads/mom.png)

![Marcd Landing Page](/images/uploads/marcd.png)

![Vastmix Landing Page](/images/uploads/vastmix.png)

short: A collection of new studio websites for your inspiration!
